name: Bright Minds Therapy
longDescription: We offer personalized programs for Dyslexia support using research-backed methods.

name: Focus Coaching
longDescription: Our structured ADHD coaching uses cognitive behavioral techniques and parent involvement.

name: Spark Minds
shortDescription: Supporting children with Autism Spectrum Disorder.
longDescription: We specialize in one-on-one programs that develop communication and life skills for children with ASD.

name: Leap Ahead
shortDescription: Expert speech therapy for all age groups.
longDescription: Leap Ahead focuses on articulation, fluency, and language development for children with communication challenges.

name: Skill Tree
shortDescription: Helping children gain daily living skills.
longDescription: Skill Tree provides sensory integration and fine motor skill development with professional therapists.

name: EduCare Pathways
shortDescription: Tailored academic plans for special learners.
longDescription: EduCare Pathways works with children who need IEPs, customized curriculum, and one-on-one support.
